    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        int getOrientation()
        Returns the current orientation or this viewport.
        Returns:
        ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT if height > width, ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE if height < width, or ORIENTATION_NONE if height == width.
